description: Variation of Conditions 1 and 12 of planning permission dated 16th August 2023 (RN: 23/01025/FULL) for the following: 'Single storey extension at rear ground floor level on Bywell Place through the infilling of the existing car ramp to basement level; extensions to the rear of the building at fourth and fifth floor levels. Provision of an external terrace at fourth floor level on the Wells Street side of the building; installation of PV panels and new plant within enclosure at main roof level; installation of a green roof area at fourth floor level adjoining Bywell Place. All works in conjunction with the refurbishment of the existing building for continued use for commercial, business and service use (Class E).' Namely, alterations to the core arrangements; a new lift overrun; an infill extension at rear 4th and 5th floors; modifying one consented window into an external door; and amended wording of condition 12 to require compliance with the submitted biodiversity management plan.  (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
